full_summary:
### Tender Details

#### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number**: 1000031151
* **Publication Date**: November 15, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 30, 2022 at 14:00 (Local time)
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Amendment Date**: November 17, 2022
* **Tender Status**: Cancelled

#### Contract Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Justice Canada
* **Contact Person**: Kayla Pordonick
* **Contact Email**: Kayla.Pordonick@justice.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone**: 613-948-2525
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR), Ottawa, Ontario, Canada

#### Trade Agreements

* This tender is open to contractors that hold a partnership agreement with the Government of Canada. Specifically, this tender seeks vendors that can participate under the following free trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (HFTC)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (PAFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (CUK TCA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

#### Tender Cancellation
This tender notice has been cancelled. There is no further information available. Interested vendors should contact the above-mentioned contact person for more details.

#### Tips
The Canadian government encourages all eligible vendors to register with their supplier database. This allows them to track and bid on all upcoming tenders within their area of expertise. Please [register on their website](https://buyandsell.gc.ca '"Buy and Sell" Supplier Registration') to receive timely updates about upcoming procurement opportunities.
